text: @GovernorKayIvey The very sick and dead Covid19 cases have no need for this site. All those Memorial weekend beach goers are going untreated for Covid19. You have no capacity for new cases. It is great your killing many of your constituents. Aren't you old enough to know the Spanish Flu?
